title: Saturday Rad Bazaar Finds
content:
Today, we’ve got a fine selection of used (and new) goods from the Rad Bazaar, our Group Ride subscribers‘ selling platform, featuring some unique offerings. Let’s check it all out!

Crust Wombat Complete, Size L, Blue $1800

I have finally decided to sell my Crust Wombat as a complete. This bike is an absolute blast, but I have come to realize that its slightly too small and that it overlaps with other bikes I have too much. This thing rips! Everything was custom selected to make for a fun and comfortable ride. Comes with a dynamo setup so that you can just get up and go.

2022 Pipedream A.L.I.C.E $2,200

Pipedream Alice (https://www.pipedreamcycles.com/shop/alice-set/) size L build for sale. See below for build specs and see Pipedream site for geo. Reach out with any questions. Bike is in great condition and rides super well, no mechanical issues whatsoever. Just did a full tear down and serviced all the bearings.

All City Cosmic Stallion GRX 52 (Fit of 54/55) $2000

Completely stock and very low mile Cosmic Stallion. Incredible gravel and dirt racer bikey. Just not the one for me. Message for additional photos or offers. Thanks! Will ship continental 48 for $100

1989 Specialized Stumpjumper Team, 19.5” $1300

I bought this only two months ago. It was bone stock when I got it. I’ve updated the tires (Ultradynamico Mars Races set up split- tubeless) and converted it to drop bars (brand new Nitto stem and noodle bars, brand new Dia-Compe brakes and shifters, brand new padded Newbaums tape). I still have the OG handlebars and can switch it back to mtn bike mode if you prefer. I’ll send both set-ups either way. The bike is in great shape–I’d call it working man’s collectible. It’s got some marks to show it’s been used and loved, but nothing crazy or out of the ordinary.

Sklar PBJ Frameset $2800

Sklar PBJ hardtail/full rigid, handmade! Size Large. Have loved this bike, particularly for touring. Selling because I am wishing I had him build a medium.

 

 

If you’d like access to a seller’s account on the Rad Bazaar, simply sign up for our Group Ride subscription plan ($6.66 a month or $69.69 a year.) In doing so, you support our independent Reportage, gain access to discounts to our merchandise, and more! See all the details at our Group Ride page.

The post Saturday Rad Bazaar Finds appeared first on The Radavist.
author: John Watson
